alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 2:22PM PST until January 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 to 70 mph. Isolated wind gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern Ventura County Mountains and Interstate 5 Corridor including the Grapevine. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very hazardous. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. Significant blowing and drifting snow causing near-zero visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains
